footer_description: Your partner for logistics, industrial equipment and services.
hero_title: Your Partner for Logistics, Industrial Equipment and Services
hero_desc: Welcome to DACAN, an Ivorian company committed to providing reliable solutions in transport, logistics, machine rental and specialized equipment supply.
services_desc: At DACAN, we offer a diversified range that meets the technical and logistical needs of modern companies. Each department has its own specialized expertise.
transport_desc: Customized transport and logistics solutions supporting you in all your logistics needs with a smooth, secure and punctual transport of your goods.
spare_parts_desc: Reliable parts for your vehicles, delivered on time. We provide a wide choice of original or compatible spare parts for maintenance and repair.
rental_desc: Rent according to your needs, gain efficiency. We offer the flexibility you need through our commercial vehicle and specialized machinery rental service.
fire_protection_desc: Secure your teams and premises with certified personal protective equipment (PPE) and fire safety systems that meet regulatory requirements.
welding_desc: Technology for your operations. We provide professionals with high-performance welding equipment adapted to their standards and business requirements.
real_estate_desc: A global support for all your projects with cross-cutting services in relation to logistics support, commercial representation and real estate operations.
impact_text: Discover how DACAN has grown to become a trusted partner for businesses across Ivory Coast.
contact_text: Every client is unique. At DACAN, our rates adapt to your needs and business nature. Contact us for a personalized, quick, and commitment-free quote.
contact_placeholder: [Client Testimonial or Image Will Go Here]
services_text_main: Explore our comprehensive range of services designed to meet all your business needs. For each service, we focus on quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction.
transport_text: DACAN supports you in all your logistics needs, ensuring a smooth, secure and punctual transport of your goods. We serve the entire national territory with an adapted fleet of vehicles and an experienced logistics team.
transport_4: Flow management and supply chain optimization
spare_text: We provide professionals with a wide choice of original or compatible spare parts for the maintenance and repair of their vehicles. Whether it is a company fleet or specific equipment, we guarantee quality and availability.
spare_2: Parts for trucks and commercial vehicles
spare_link: Request Quote for Vehicle Spare Parts
rental_text: DACAN offers the flexibility you need for your operations through its commercial vehicle and specialized machinery rental service. For a day, a week or more, choose the right equipment at the right time.
rental_3: Technical equipment by sector of activity
rental_benefit_1: Fleet maintained and ready for use
rental_benefit_2: Competitive rates with or without driver
rental_link: Request Quote for Vehicle & Machinery Rental
protection_text: To meet regulatory requirements and protect your employees, DACAN provides certified personal protective equipment (PPE) and fire safety systems.
protection_2: Fire extinguishers, smoke detectors, fire blankets
protection_3: First aid kits and evacuation devices
protection_benefit_1: Products in accordance with current standards
protection_benefit_2: Support for the security of your facilities
protection_link: Request Quote for Fire & Protection Equipment
welding_text: We provide professionals in the industrial and medical sector with high-performance welding equipment, adapted to their standards and business requirements.
welding_link: Request Quote for Industrial & Medical Welding
realestate_text: DACAN also offers cross-cutting services in relation to its core business: financial, commercial or real estate operations, directly or in partnership with specialised players.
realestate_3: Intermediation for acquisition/lease of land and warehouses
realestate_link: Request Quote for Commercial & Real Estate Services

advantage.title: The DACAN Advantage
advantage.subtitle: Choose DACAN for comprehensive solutions that give your business a competitive edge.

time.title: Time Efficiency
time.text: We understand the importance of time in business operations and ensure fast, punctual service delivery.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.text: All our products and services meet high-quality standards, giving you peace of mind.

cost.title: Cost Effectiveness
cost.text: Our solutions are designed to optimize your budget while maximizing operational efficiency.

support.title: Technical Support
support.text: Our experienced team provides ongoing technical advice and assistance whenever needed.

servicesHero.title: Our Services
servicesHero.text: At DACAN, we offer a diversified range that meets the technical and logistical needs of modern companies. Each department has its own detailed expertise to provide you with tailor-made, efficient and secure solutions.

servicesFooter.title: Need a Custom Solution?
servicesFooter.text: Our team is ready to develop tailored solutions for your specific business challenges. Contact us today to discuss how we can support your operations.

aboutHero.title: About DACAN
aboutHero.text: Discover our journey, values, and commitment to supporting businesses across Côte d'Ivoire.

aboutFooter.title: Ready to Work With Us?
aboutFooter.text: Each client is unique. At DACAN, our rates adapt to your needs and the nature of your business. Contact us for a personalized quote, fast and without commitment.

aboutFuture.title: Looking to the Future
aboutFuture.text: As we continue to grow, our focus remains on expanding our capabilities, enhancing our service offerings, and building stronger relationships with our clients and partners.

service.title: Service Expansion
service.text: We are continuously expanding our service portfolio to meet the evolving needs of businesses across various sectors in Ivory Coast.

reach.title: Geographic Reach
reach.text: Our plans include extending our operational coverage to serve more regions and communities throughout the country.

tech.title: Technology Integration
tech.text: We're investing in advanced technologies to enhance our operational efficiency and provide better services to our clients.
